name: Send Delighted surveys from new rows in Google Sheets spreadsheet
description:
This template periodically checks for new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet and uses the retrieved information to trigger sending of Delighted surveys.

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10w9BPRVaVdAVWgtRpZYvF-KRqUo8cNVLnZljU-s--cs/edit#gid=0) to check for new email recipients of your Delighted surveys. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
